DOC.brief_title: Adherence & Health Outcome Differences Amongst HIV Infected Patients Prescribed HAART
DOC.detailed_description: This phase IV retrospective chart review HIV infect patient private Infectious disease practice West Palm Beach , FL . This chart review assign patient one two group base antiretroviral regimen : single tablet regimen ( STR ) versus multi tablet regimen ( MTR ) . Up 650 patient chart review 500 patient need statistical analysis . The primary objective look proportion patient adherence rate great equal 95 % subject prescribe STR versus MTR . Secondary Objectives : - Differences emergency room visit , hospitalization readmission patient take STR vs. MTR - Proportion patient HIV viral load le 50copies/microliter - Incidence new onset worsen hyperlipidemia patient take STR versus MTR - Incidence acute renal insufficiency - Compare absolute CD4 number increase STR MTR - Compare monthly copay amount patient take STR versus MTR - Identify incidence opportunistic infection patient take STR versus MTR
DOC.criteria: Male Female ( gender birth ) , age 18 year older Documented HIV1 infection western blot HIV viral load Prescribed antiretroviral therapy , either STR ( single tablet regime ) MTR ( multi tablet regimen ) least 6 month Patients minimum 3 office visit Patients evaluate hospital never come clinic
